extendedInfo.description: App Developed by http://dlb-network.com/DLB-Network Mobile is the number 1 hub for all your gaming needs. We offer the latest news from all gaming devs, the number 1 gaming/tech podcast from podomatic.com, Latest unboxing/reviews and more from the DLB-Network Team plus all the latest gameplay videos/trailers. That's not it we also give you screenshots from all the up and coming games plus twitter feeds, facebook feeds and more, check out full details below.NEWS - You will receive all the latest news from all major game devs and platform devs so you will never miss out on what is coming to your console in the future. PODCAST - Listen to the DLB-Network podcast straight in the application, this is the Number 1 gaming podcast on Podomatic.com so believe me when you listen you will love it.VIDEOS (Improved In Pro Version)- Watch all the latest videos from the DLB-Network team plus watch all the latest gaming trailers that have just hit the web. SCREENSHOTS - Take a look at are library of screenshots which grow each week, we offer you screenshots from all the top games that are coming soon.TWITTER/FACEBOOK FEEDS (Improved In Pro Version) - Take a look at what playstation, Nintendo and Microsoft are saying on there twitter feeds, so now you will know why the playstation network is down ;).LIVE BLOGGING OF E3/GAMESCOM (Exclusive to Pro Version)- As off next year When these two events are live we will be live blogging whats going on straight in the application so if your at work or away from your computer you still know whats going on. NO ADS (Exclusive to Pro Version) - Tired off ads popping up in your app well with this application we have none so no need to worry.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love gaming then u must get this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start.
reviews.comment: Love the app but can\'t store in my SD. Want an easy way to noticed if it\'s a video new or just a article.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pour awesome best gaming app out xperia play

reviews.title: Best Gaming Podcast Period!
reviews.comment: Love these guys and the website. They usually keep up with most of the important issues in gaming and when the podcast goes up, it is party time. It is a joy to listen to these guys and read their stories.
reviews.author: Relojo Asenime
